title: (x) ARD "Das Erste" serif tagline - The Antiqua {Rainer}
content:
It's not Swift.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ard\_das\_erste.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021205513/http:/typophile.com/files/ard_das_erste.jpg) | 78.02 KB |
author: Jan

comments.content: I'd say [The Antiqua](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021205513/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?Pid=413961) by Luc de Groot.

Nope.  
The Serif is what I figured since they've been using The Sans all the way. But it's not.

The Antiqua it seems to be.  
Sure goes well with The Sans.  
Thanx
It is meant to be. Luc(as) designed The Antiqua because he never intended TheSerif to be used for body text and wanted to provide a matching text face for the Thesis family.
